title: t206 HOFers, SLers, Scrap and an Underprint available...prices lowered on 11/26!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: t206 HOFers, SLers, Scrap and an Underprint available...prices lowered on 11/26!!
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd offer up a few t206s I have available....

Griffith - The Griffith was originally part of a puzzle that when put together displays an ad for Oaks Tobacco. On this example, you can see part of a hand, 2 sets of acorns and another symbol. There are a few other examples out there however, this sort of an "underprint" does not come up too often. The 1909 tobacco ad for "Oaks Tobacco" was originally printed while t206's where printed at American litho in NYC. --- Asking $500

Marquard Piedmont 350 PSA 3 - no creasing...mild touches to corners --- $175

Revelle Old Mill PSA 4 - Southern Leaguer...- no creasing...mild touches to corners --- $225 (sold!!)

Chase Portrait (Blue) Sweet Corporal 350 PSA 3 - Very sharp card with terrfic color, no creasing --- $75 (sold!!)

Spade Scrap w/ Piedmont 150 reverse....Oversized borders --- $225 (Sold!!)

Prices include shipping/insurance.  Thanks all!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Revelle and Chase have sold, however, Spade, Griffith and Marquard are still available. Any takers on these remaining three?

Down to just Griffith and Marquard now.  I will drop Griffith to $450 delivered and Marquard to $160 delivered.  I'll also offer up both cards for $550 if anybody wants the pair!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
One final bump....I'll go $400 for Griffith and $140 for Marquard.  $500 for the pair.  Thanks all...
